name: Ubiquiti UniFi/UISP
description: Ubiquiti UniFi and UISP device monitoring via API. 21 alert types covering device status, interfaces, CPU, memory, and outages.
author: OpsConductor

alerts.title: Firmware Update
alerts.description: Firmware update available for this device. Consider scheduling maintenance window for update.

alerts.title: High Cpu
alerts.description: CPU utilization exceeds configured threshold. May indicate heavy traffic, attack, or process issue.

alerts.title: High Cpu
alerts.description: CPU utilization high

alerts.title: High Memory
alerts.description: Memory usage exceeds configured threshold. May require device restart or configuration review.

alerts.title: Temperature Critical
alerts.description: Device temperature is critically high. Immediate attention required to prevent damage.

alerts.title: Temperature High
alerts.description: Device temperature is elevated. Check ventilation and ambient temperature.

alerts.title: Device Offline
alerts.description: AP offline

alerts.title: Device Offline
alerts.description: Ubiquiti device is offline or unreachable. Check power, network connectivity, and device status in UISP.

alerts.title: Device Online
alerts.description: AP online

alerts.title: Device Online
alerts.description: Device came back online - clears device_offline alert.

alerts.title: Interface Down
alerts.description: Interface down

alerts.title: Interface Down
alerts.description: Network interface is down on the device. Check cable, port, or remote device.

alerts.title: Interface Up
alerts.description: Interface up

alerts.title: Interface Up
alerts.description: Network interface came back up - clears interface_down alert.

alerts.title: Outage
alerts.description: Network outage detected for this device. Site may be down or experiencing connectivity issues.

alerts.title: Outage Ended
alerts.description: Network outage has ended - clears outage alert.

alerts.title: Outage Ended
alerts.description: Outage ended

alerts.title: Outage Started
alerts.description: Outage started

alerts.title: Device Offline
alerts.description: AP offline

alerts.title: Device Offline
alerts.description: Ubiquiti device is offline or unreachable. Check power, network connectivity, and device status in UISP.

alerts.title: Signal Degraded
alerts.description: Wireless signal strength is below -70 dBm. Check antenna alignment, interference, or distance.

clear_events.description: Alerts auto-resolve when condition no longer detected
